name: WAKAF QURAN
description:
Applications that connect between Wakif, Hafidz and waqf managers with the hope that the wakif who is waqf of the quran will feel enthusiastic because the quran is read by the hafidz



https://www.figma.com/file/JGkXDTsB4OR1BLsUnxtWGo/WAKAF-QURAN?node-id=2%3A3

----------------------


Aplikasi yang menghubungkan antara

Wakif, Hafidz dan pengelola wakaf


dengan harapan wakif yang mewakaf kan quran agar merasa semangat karena al qurannhya di baca oleh para hafidz
